file_content.text: In defeating me, you let the real enemy linger on. You... you doom the galaxy!
Say what you will about the Emperor; you're the one presenting a threat right now.
Had you been successful, had you brought the Emperor back, you would have made the galaxy's destruction all but a certainty.
You got it wrong. Bringing the Emperor back--that would mean we're all done for.
Keeping the Emperor as he is, that means there's an outside chance, yes. What you were up to would've resulted in a sure thing.
She's right, you know.
He's right, you know.
No. Not you.
You've been so blinded by your unchecked rage, your thirst for vengeance, that you could not see the truth.
Now that your power has subsided, I may finally confront you. I only hope you will listen.
You're both Revan.
I see what's happening here.
Yes, though neither of us is truly Revan.
What exactly is happening here?
Wait, what?
I was handling this.
This is my moment.
And you've done well.
When I died, I had come to terms. I was ready to become one with the Force. But I soon realized that was only what part of me wanted.
I cast you out! It was the only way to go on--to remain and finish what we started! You were holding me back!
You think you're stronger this way, but you're not. Neither of us is. We're broken. We can't go on like this.
I won't stop. Not until I conjure the Emperor. I have to face him.
Hahaha.
Hahaha!
You wanted my return. You did not need to destroy whole fleets or turn a living world barren for that....
You only had to point the Empire and Republic to a shared adversary, and let them do what they do naturally: make war.
The scores of dead have nourished me. I am awakened. And I bring with me--death!
Do not fret, Wrath. You are still special to me. That is why I will kill you last.
The Emperor was not as strong as he might have been had Revan succeeded, but he was strong enough.
No.... He was supposed to face me.... To....
You're too weak. You won't last.
I.... If we unite, what I am--won't it fade? Become diminished...?
Lord Wrath. You have endured betrayal upon betrayal.
Dark Lord. Even I look in awe at your accelerated rise to power.
Bounty hunter. No outsider has ever held as much sway with the Empire as you hold now.
Commander. Even without the support you'd grown accustomed to, you still thrive like none other.
You did not get where you are today through kindness or moderation. It has served you well.
You find value in restraint, in virtue. Look at how well your way has served you.
You strike a balance within yourself. A practicality. It has served you well.
You make a fine example.
I don't know if I'm ready.
You have to be. We have to.
You are once again complete.
It's more than that. For the first time in a long time, I'm... myself.
You have found your center.
I have. For the first time in a long time.
So are you... all together now?
Are you... you?
For the first time in a long time, I am.
Thank you--for all you've done, and for all you've shown me.
Dark days lie ahead. The darkest days. If my error can't be undone, everyone will pay the price.
Brace for the worst....
It's over.
You've been at my heels far too long.
I knew the Rishi plan was a longshot, but I had to try. Had to make it legitimate. I needed to lure you in.
You were supposed to stay busy on Rishi long enough for me to finish here. But no, you couldn't do that, could you?
Not a chance.
You have underestimated me for the last time.
Wrath, you need to back down. You're too close to all this to see just how much is at stake.
Something you should understand when it comes to me: I don't dawdle.
No, apparently not. I thought you more than anyone would comprehend just how much is at stake.
Have you not seen a single holovid about me? Skimmed my bio, anything?
I'm not one of your pathetic bounties. Too much is at stake.
I never was much for keeping idle.
No, you're always out digging where you don't belong, aren't you? And you still don't see the whole story.
Give up while you still can.
Surrender.
You're impossible.
This has all been one big deception, hasn't it? You aren't even the man you claim to be.
You're not Revan.
You don't know what you're talking about.
I spent three hundred years in lock step with the Emperor's mind. I know what he's become, what he wants.
The Emperor must be destroyed completely or he will return and consume every last living thing!
There's no cost too great. If I have to snuff out every life on this world by hand to draw the Emperor out, then so be it!
You can't defeat him.
Even at his weakest, you are no match for the Emperor.
Have some common sense. The Emperor is the dark side incarnate. You wouldn't stand a chance.
Comes down to a fight between the two of you, I'll put every last credit on the Emperor.
You're mad to think you'd even stand a chance against his power. You're nothing to him.
If you're Revan, who spoke to me outside the temple?
So... you are Revan?
Of course, it's so obvious now. You have no idea what I am, what I've become.
Whatever the Emperor's done or may wish to do, it's my place to handle it. Not yours.
He is my responsibility.
You're so naive, Wrath. You don't even begin to comprehend what I've become.
This is your final warning....
Last chance to give up.
Your warnings are meaningless to me. What I've become, you have no hope of stopping.
I was a Dark Lord of the Sith. I was the Prodigal Knight. I was powerful--but I was also weak. Not anymore.
Now I'm pure. Unburdened. I can finally have revenge on my jailer and save the galaxy doing it!
I have the power--and you have nothing!
You are wrong, Revan.
She has powerful allies.
He has powerful allies.
Both Sith and Jedi.
Allies from all corners of the galaxy.
We have your back, <FirstName>!
Heard the fight to end all fights was going down. What sorry kind of Mando would I be if I missed out?
You were saying...?
I don't care how many of you there are. I won't be denied my destiny!
I am Revan!
Shae Vizla?
Hahaha... hahaha!
What's happening?
Impossible... the ritual hasn't even begun....
The deaths you've caused. The war you've fueled. It is all mine.
This galaxy is mine. It's time I claimed it once more.
Is everyone all right?
Sound off. Any injuries?
That was... something. Everybody make it?
We're fine.
That was him....
The Emperor.
We stopped Revan. How is that possible?
The Emperor.
How is that possible? We stopped Revan.
He did not assume a physical form or possess a body. And he left as soon as he appeared. None of it makes sense.
Still packs a punch.
I think the droid took a bump.
The general is entirely misinformed, your imminence! A few coats of paint and I'll be ready for the Lunar Gala!
Looks like we weren't the only survivors.
He might be able to tell us more about what's happened.
Maybe he can explain all this.
I still don't understand. This looks like Revan, but so did the spirit.
So is this Revan or not?
All truth is revealed with time.
It's about time we finished this.
Not for long.
Wait.
I've... failed....
As have I.
So many centuries. The Emperor and his Dread Masters, trying to wrench me apart, to unleash my anger and hatred....
I detached myself from the pain. Focused on the Force.
You hid behind Jedi platitudes! You weren't strong enough to survive the torture, or the battle in the Foundry. I faced them! I survived them!
You've carried on, dragging the remains of a body that should have long since faded to dust.
Hatred fueled cunning, but burned out all wisdom. Without me, you could not see.
Strength is useless without wisdom to guide it.
Strength is useless without some wisdom to guide it.
We need to repair what the Emperor has done.
And without him, you died. He needs your wisdom, but you need his strength. His focus.
Let me help you finish what we started.
Each part of you was needed as much as the other. The Emperor split you apart, because you were strongest when you were together.
That's why the Emperor tried so hard to split you up. Two pieces working separately aren't nearly as good as one whole, working together.
Together, we can prevail.
I am whole again... but there is much to do. The Emperor has returned. Steel yourselves against what will come.
Let's get back to basecamp. He was right--we have a lot to do.
You barely managed to drive me away last time. What makes you think you can survive against me?
Your entire armies barely managed to drive me back. You think you'll be able to face me without them?
The Force is not my only ally.
No soldier fights alone.
I have a feeling I'm not the only one who wants a crack at you.
Shae Vizla?
Wouldn't miss a fight this good.
Bring as many fools as you like. You won't stop what must be done!
You don't know what you're doing. The Emperor is too powerful!
No! Not any longer! I have set my will against this creature for centuries--only I can destroy him!
But you aren't Revan!
Who else could do what I've done? Who else would have a strength to come this far?
I am Revan. And I will complete the work I started so long ago.
Take a step back. Look at what you're doing.
Stop and think.
You're only going to make the Emperor stronger. This is what he wants, don't you see that?
You understand nothing! I know his mind better than anyone living--I know what must be done!
I spoke to Revan's spirit. You can't be him.
You can't be Revan.
Lies. You have been deceived.
Your time is long past. You don't belong here. You belong in the ground.
Whoever you are, you're dead.
Not until he is gone forever!
Can't you see what you've become? Your hatred and regrets are consuming you.
My own flesh and blood, standing against me. The depths of his corrupting influence are endless.
I will waste no more time. This must end--now!
